all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Wherefore, thou shalt do all that thou doest in the name of the Son, and thou shalt repent and call upon God in the name of the Son forevermore.
Moses 5:8
Quote of the Day
"When we take upon ourselves the name of Jesus Christ, we link our name with His. We identify with Him."
Elder Dale G. Renlund | 1 Oct 2025General Conference
